channel.title: How do I make Veng need 45 Defence to use? PLS HELP
channel.description:
Like the title says I reallllllly need help with this, It's making pure PKing on my Server suck!
I need to make Vengeance require 45 defence to use, If anybody could help me out I'ld be really grateful. At the moment any1 with 94 magic can do it. :|

item.title: How do I make Veng need 45 Defence to use? PLS HELP
item.dc:creator: @ameer122 ameer122
item.description:
@ameer122 wrote:

[quote=“Skilled Moms, post:6, topic:356921”][quote author=ameer122 link=topic=453448.msg3322318#msg3322318 date=1282814666]
add this

if(c.playerLevel[change this to the def skill number] < 45){ c.sM("You need a magic level of 96 better to cast this spell."); }
[/quote]
I love your 0 rep id make it 1 if i could =[/quote]

lol

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make Veng need 45 Defence to use? PLS HELP
